transcript:
Customer: Hello?
Executive: Hello?
Customer: Hello, Namaskar ma'am. Chakdola Enterprises se baat kar rahi hain?
Customer: Haan, kar rahi hoon main.
Executive: Ji, aapko aapne customer care pe call kiya tha. Kuch issue aa raha hai aapko buyleads mein?
Customer: Ye issue issue aa raha hai isliye main call kar rahi thi kyunki woh hum log jo dhoondh rahe the woh cheez nahi mil raha hai. Jaise ki hum log ka ba- paarse jaise woh product product mil raha hai but hum log ko toh polyretan and waste water treatment ka cheezon mein woh cheez nahi mil raha hai hum log. Kitna bhi dhoonde woh usi ke upar kuch nahi mil raha hai toh isliye hum log
Executive: Accha, toh maine toh jo hai pehle ye saari cheezein main account manager ji actually baat kar raha hoon aapki company ka. Toh pehle toh discussion hua tha sir ko maine batai thi ki kaise aapke products ko jo hai jo aapke other products hain unki leads aapko kaise milegi, kahan pe search karna padega. Toh search buylead mein aap product search nahi kar rahe hain ma'am?
Customer: Woh main baar baar kar hi rahi hoon isliye toh bol rahi hoon na woh jaake bahut bahut time mein search kar rahi hoon toh ek bhi cheez nahi show ho raha hai na ek dekho ek do cheez cheez ho raha hai toh theek hai woh woh cheez kuch bhi nahi source source nahi mil raha hai wahan se. Woh usi related bhi kuch nahi mil raha hai.
Executive: Jaise abhi buylead abhi HCL acid ki aayi hui hai toh ye aapke kaam ki nahi hai ma'am?
Customer: Woh toh abhi kuch nahi kaam ki nahi hai. HCL ka idhar ek hi cheez jo wohi cheez bioside ka hai woh. Hum log ka toh polylotile lotile hai na jaise ki kya bolu enolic.
Executive: Ye poly aluminium chloride hai iski buylead chahiye aapko, right?
Customer: Hmm. Jaise waste water material mein jo cheezein chemical use hota hai na woh cheez hum log ka hum log side mein likha hua hai na pura details likha hai hum log ka company ka toh cheez jo kaun sa chemical hum log bech rahe hain aur kuch.
Executive: Accha.
Customer: Usi ke upar kuch bhi nahi aa raha hai jaise ki wanshi ke upar kuch bhi nahi koi bhi ek ek hi message bhi nahi hai maine bahut baar try kiya do din se.
Executive: Dekhiye buylead jo hai ye pura totally artificial intelligence based hai, theek hai? Ye aapka past jo hai purchase behavior jo hai woh read karke aage aapko lead zyada send karta hai. Toh past mein aapne jaise like do mahine ho gaye aapke accounts ko jo hai IndiaMART pe aaye hue, theek hai? Toh HCL ka aap continuous dekhoge lead manager mein jaake uski buylead use hui hai. Beech mein mujhe jo hai ye concern aaya tha ki caustic soda flex wagera ki buyleads nahi mil rahi hain, theek hai? Toh humne jo hai categories wagera extra add kiya tha toh uski bhi leads aa rahi thi. Toh abhi kya hai leads jaise aapke product mein competitors zyada hain online. Theek hai? Toh leads jo zyada tar sold out ho ja rahi hai. Ab jaise abhi bhi dekhiye caustic soda ki ek buylead aayi thi Rajkot Gujarat se ek ghante pehle hi.
Customer: Woh woh hmm theek hai.
Executive: But but jo hai us pe paanch jo hai customers ke zyada se zyada calls chale gaye toh woh sold out ho gaye woh cheez cheezein ho gayi toh abhi 500 kg ki lead aayi thi.
Customer: Hum log wohi cheez mein focus nahi kar rahe hain na bol rahi hoon hum log main bol rahi hoon na woh jo aapki bol rahe bioside ki ek mane product ke upar hum log focus nahi kar rahe hain.
Executive: Dekhiye ma'am main bata raha hoon buyleads mein aapko kya show hoga wohi bata raha hoon main. Jo aapke products IndiaMART pe list hain, theek hai? Unki jo category list hai us product ke andar toh unki match making hoti hai jab koi buyer buylead jo hai generate karta hai toh woh match making hoke software jo hai aapko buylead deti hai, theek hai? Ab aap jo product keh rahe ho direct woh agar aap search buylead mein use karoge toh agar us time us product ki buylead available hogi panel pe toh woh aapko show hogi. Abhi aap jo product bol rahe hain woh toh main dekh nahi raha hoon ki kahin pe list hai aapke catalog pe. Jo jaise ji bataiye.
Customer: Ek minute aapko main isko open kar rahi hoon.
Executive: Open kijiye ma'am.
Customer: Nahi mujhe do minute dijiye main aapko bata rahi hoon ek minute ek minute.

Executive: Maine sir ko jo hai pehle bhi bataya tha ki aapki jo total category hai hamare paas sabse zyada buyleads aapke categories mein HCL ki hai, caustic soda ki hai aur aapka ye hai RO anti scalent, theek hai? Iska hai microbyle culture ka hai aur poly aluminium chloride ka aur baki jo buyleads hain woh per month ke hisab se 40 to 50 hi hamare paas aa paati hain aur upar ke jo categories maine aapko bataye uski leads hamare paas zyada hai. Iski leads aap jo chahiye toh hum bech den kyunki ye bhi aapka major product hai kahin na kahin agar product catalog mein list hua hai toh ma'am.
Customer: Nahi woh toh main dekh hi rahi hoon lekin mere ko nahi hai.
Executive: Ji ji.

Customer: Ma'am ye services aap kab se jo hai dekh rahe ho?
Customer: Main toh do din se dekh rahi hoon iske upar.
Executive: Do din se actually kabhi baat nahi hui na jo hai Hamesha sir se hui hai. Toh aap staff wagera hain ya jo hai owner ke ghar se hain aap?
Customer: Nahi nahi main main unke andar kaam kar rahi hoon do din se mujhe sope hain is kaam ko dekhne ke liye.
Executive: Accha accha accha.
Customer: Toh main dekh rahi hoon toh isliye main mujhe bhi itna idea nahi tha ki IndiaMART mein dekhi thi but ye product ke upar itna idea nahi tha toh main soch ki ye search mark marte ja rahi thi karte ja rahi thi. Fir bhi kya hum log jo dhoondh rahe woh toh nahi mil raha hai baki jo hum log ko bio by side mein jo.
Executive: Theek hai aisa karte hain ki ab toh dekhiye ma'am jo hai office ka timing ho gaya close hone ka kyunki 6:40 ho rahe hain, theek hai? Main kal subah jo hai aapke sath ek video meeting rakhunga aapke products pe jo sir se pehle baat chit hui hai woh cheezein aapko toh maine bata di hain, theek hai? Aur jo lead is product line mein kaise milega woh main aapko bataunga jaise aap keh rahe ho pehle se IndiaMART aap use kar rahe ho jiski lead nahi milti thi search lead mein aap jaate the toh uski lead jo hai mil jaati thi aapko, theek hai? Lekin isme jo cheez search kar rahe ho woh nahi mil raha hai. Toh kal video meet pe screen to screen ye dekhenge ma'am ki actually mein jo product aapko want hai jo need hai woh catalog pe list hai ya nahi, category list hai ya nahi aur woh hamare jo approved buyleads mein hai woh hai ya nahi, theek hai? Toh aap mera number ye save kar lijiye. Mera number tha nahi aapke paas isliye aapne customer call ko call kiya, theek hai? Customer care se.
Customer: Theek hai abhi toh.
Executive: Theek hai ji ji. Mera naam Adarsh Jaiswal hai meri puri details aap jab IndiaMART app mein settings mein jayenge settings ke sath mein toh aapko ek details hoti hai ma'am account manager ki toh wahan pe aapko mil jayenge, theek hai? Toh abhi jo ye aapne concern ke liye jo hai aapka jo concern tha woh main close kar de raha hoon main samne se aapko kal subah 10 baje tak call karta hoon, theek hai ma'am?
Customer: Theek hai theek hai theek hai.
Executive: Theek hai koi issue nahi thank you. Ha main yahan pe reminder laga de raha hoon ma'am aapke account mein main samne se aapko call kar lunga 10 baje.
Customer: Theek hai thank you.
Executive: Theek hai thank you.
summary:
Concerns:

- Not finding specific products in buyleads.

- Unable to find waste water treatment chemicals.

- Only bioside products showing up.



Resolution:

- Executive explained buylead generation process.

- Executive offered a video meeting to resolve issue.

- Executive will check catalog and buylead availability.



Next Steps: 

- Executive will call customer next day at 10 AM.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Satisfied



@@@Key Topics:

- buyleads, catalog, product search, video meeting
